welcome_message_title: Welcome to Sobral de Monte Agraco
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sobral de Monte Agraco! Nestled in the picturesque countryside of Portugal, our charming city is known for its rich history, architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that Sobral de Monte Agraco has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lisbon Portela Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Lisbon Portela Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the Wi-Fi network for free for up to 2 hours.
